LanguageData.TFJ_Tool_Carr.label: Cart
LanguageData.TFJ_Tool_Carr.description: A hand truck is a device for manual transportation of goods. Consists of wheels (their number depends on the modification and purpose of the trolley), a frame in different versions and handles for a comfortable grip.
LanguageData.TFJ_Tool_Carr.tools.0.label: shaft
